short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Its a new way to remote watch a movie with friends and family over a video call

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Himalaya lets you watch Netflix  videos remotely with friends, family or that special someone.
It automatically synchronizes videos and create a group video call inside the streaming service itself.
Service is secure as connection is end-to-end encrypted and no signup is required.

We have plans to support amazon prime videos and other major streaming services in future.

Please note that every participant will require an account in corresponding streaming services.


------ 0.1.1
New-
1. Added Netflix support
2. Added beta prime video support
2. Added mute/toggle speaker button

Future update plans:
1. Improve UI/UX
2. Miscellaneous.


------ 0.1.0
1. Amazon prime video support
